metadata.title: President felicitates Lee Jae-myung on election as South Korea president

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 04 (APP):President Asif Ali Zardari on Wednesday extended his heartiest congratulations to Lee Jae-myung on his election as President of the Republic of Korea. The president, in a statement, said that Pakistan remained committed to deepening its partnership with the Republic of Korea to achieve our mutual objectives for regional and global peace, as well as the prosperity of the two nations.
